00043 DelayCalculator* DelayCalculator::getInstance(void) {
00044 
00045     if ( 0 == _instance ) {
00046 
00047         _instance = new DelayCalculator();
00048     }
00049 
00050     return _instance;
00051 }

00056 void DelayCalculator::destroy(void) {
00057 
00058     if ( _instance ) {
00059 
00060         delete _instance;
00061         _instance = 0;
00062     }
00063 }

00068 //
00069 // PROCESSOR INTERFACE
00070 //
00072 void DelayCalculator::process(void) {
00073 
00074     /*
00075      * all constants are declared as double, in order not to worry about
00076      * those dreaded integer divisions.
00077      */
00078 
00079     // mutliplier from a quarter to a whole note
00080     static const double QUARTER_TO_WHOLE_MUTLT = 4.0;
00081 
00082     // mutliplier from a quarter to a half note
00083     static const double QUARTER_TO_HALF_MUTLT = 2.0;
00084 
00085     // mutliplier from a quarter to a quarter note
00086     static const double QUARTER_TO_QUARTER_MUTLT = 1.0;
00087 
00088     // mutliplier from a quarter to a eighth note
00089     static const double QUARTER_TO_EIGHTH_MUTLT = 1 / 2.0;
00090 
00091     // mutliplier from a quarter to a sixteenth note
00092     static const double QUARTER_TO_SIXTEENTH_MUTLT = 1 / 4.0;
00093 
00094     // mutliplier from a quarter to a thirtysecond note
00095     static const double QUARTER_TO_THIRTYSECOND_MUTLT = 1 / 8.0;
00096 
00097     // get data store
00098     Document* pDocument = Document::getInstance();
00099 
00100     // get tempo value
00101     double tempo = pDocument->getTempo();
00102 
00103     // get alteration multiplier
00104     double alterationMultiplier = pDocument->getMultiplier();
00105 
00106     // do the math
00107     pDocument->getWholeDelay()->setPeriod(
00108 
00109         getDelayPeriodFromTempoAndMutliplier(
00110                 tempo,
00111                 QUARTER_TO_WHOLE_MUTLT * alterationMultiplier
00112         )
00113     );
00114 
00115     pDocument->getHalfDelay()->setPeriod(
00116 
00117         getDelayPeriodFromTempoAndMutliplier(
00118                 tempo,
00119                 QUARTER_TO_HALF_MUTLT * alterationMultiplier
00120         )
00121     );
00122 
00123     pDocument->getQuarterDelay()->setPeriod(
00124 
00125         getDelayPeriodFromTempoAndMutliplier(
00126                 tempo,
00127                 QUARTER_TO_QUARTER_MUTLT * alterationMultiplier
00128         )
00129     );
00130 
00131     pDocument->getEighthDelay()->setPeriod(
00132 
00133         getDelayPeriodFromTempoAndMutliplier(
00134                 tempo,
00135                 QUARTER_TO_EIGHTH_MUTLT * alterationMultiplier
00136         )
00137     );
00138 
00139     pDocument->getSixTeenthDelay()->setPeriod(
00140 
00141         getDelayPeriodFromTempoAndMutliplier(
00142                 tempo,
00143                 QUARTER_TO_SIXTEENTH_MUTLT * alterationMultiplier
00144         )
00145     );
00146 
00147     pDocument->getThirtySecondDelay()->setPeriod(
00148 
00149         getDelayPeriodFromTempoAndMutliplier(
00150                 tempo, QUARTER_TO_THIRTYSECOND_MUTLT * alterationMultiplier
00151         )
00152     );
00153 
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 
00158 
00160 //
00161 // PRIVATE FUNCTIONS
00162 //
00164 const double DelayCalculator::getDelayPeriodFromTempoAndMutliplier(
00165         const double tempo,
00166         const double multiplier) {
00167 
00168     return Constants::SECONDS_PER_MINUTE / tempo * Constants::MILLISEC_PER_SECOND * multiplier;
00169 }
